thread.title: Romantic Stay In The Heart Of Paris
thread.title_full: Romantic Stay In The Heart Of Paris - Review of Relais Hotel du Vieux Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Brian P
title: Romantic Stay In The Heart Of Paris
text:
Thank you Henry & team for a truly memorable stay. Henry's professional style of management was superb! All transfers, restaurant bookings not a problem and value for money just exceptional . We will return again to this superb Hotel next week before we depart France.
Mr & Mrs Pook Australia
